name: df-sgrp2
body: |- wceq(csgrp2, crab(s0, cmgm2, wbr(cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), casslaw, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)))))
comment: A _semigroup_ is a magma with an associative operation. Definition in section II.1 of [Bruck] p. 23, or of an "associative magma" in definition 5 of [BourbakiAlg1] p. 4, or of a semigroup in section 1.3 of [Hall] p. 7. (Contributed by AV, 6-Jan-2020.)
